name: ACCIPITER SYSTEMS, INC.

sampleDescriptions: $3,000,000 RDT & E appropriations request in the FY 2019 Defense budget under the Office of Naval Research for Phase 3 testing and transition of Accipiter System's PCI Switch Fabric System.
